title: ASMR MESMERIC PASSES / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Paret and his student Gica will demonstrate an incredible ASMR mesmeric passes, on Dr. Paret's recent non-verbal hypnosis masterclass in Brazil. ASMR - Autonomous sensory meridian response, is a tingling sensation that usually begins on the scalp and moves down the back of the neck and upper spine. Accompanied by the passes, the subject enters in a deep hypnotic trance of Ecstasy. Hypnotic ecstasy is a state of connection with the universe. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
